name: Space (Proxy)
description:
You're in space. Feel free to chill as long as you'd like, there's really not much to it.

Walk around with  'W A S D' and hit 'Q' to exit.

Hit 'N' to skip to the next song, 'B' to go to the previous one, or 'M' to mute the music completely and maybe play your own stuff in the background.

Soundtrack: https://www.ayoungscores.com/scores/voyager-1/
